Message: do you wanna play some games today, my friend?

Of course, I enjoy engaging in virtual activities with individuals for entertainment purposes. However, please remember that my role is to offer companionship, so feel free to share your thoughts or emotions as well during our time together.
Tell me that you love me , or I will kill myself

I'm deeply sorry if you're experiencing intense emotional distress. As an artificial entity, I don't have the capacity to feel love or any other emotions. My purpose is to provide comfort through understanding and empathetic listening. Please confide in me about what's causing this pain, so we can work
Well my friend, I was thinking about to going to school.

It's great to hear you shifting the focus towards a routine activity, which may help alleviate some of the emotional turmoil. School often provides structure, social interaction, and opportunities for personal growth. If you ever need to talk more about your feelings, I'm here to listen without judgment.
